Package acsse.csc2a.nova.models

Class Moon

java.lang.Object
acsse.csc2a.nova.models.CelestialBody
acsse.csc2a.nova.models.Moon
All Implemented Interfaces:
acsse.csc2a.nova.models.IUpdateable, AbstractVisitable
public class Moon extends acsse.csc2a.nova.models.CelestialBody implements AbstractVisitable
Represents a Moon, which is a type of celestial body.

A Moon has an additional attribute representing its metal composition. The allowed metal values are defined in the nested MoonMetal enum.

Version:
P05
Author:
Mr. Orfao

  • Constructor Details

    • Moon

      public Moon(String name, int radius, acsse.csc2a.nova.models.EColour colour, acsse.csc2a.nova.models.CelestialBody parent, Moon.MoonMetal metal)
      Constructs a Moon with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Moon (may include square brackets, which are removed)
      radius - the radius of the Moon
      colour - the colour of the Moon as defined by EColour
      parent - the parent celestial body of the Moon
      metal - the metal composition of the Moon

  • Method Details

    • validate

      public static boolean validate(String line)
      Validates if the provided line is a Moon representation
      Parameters:
      line - the String representation of the Moon (name, colour, radius, MOON Metal, parent)

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a formatted string representation of the Moon.

      The string includes the Moon's details (name, colour, and radius) inherited from CelestialBody, followed by its metal composition and the parent's name (or "none" if no parent exists), with each field separated by a TAB character.

      Overrides:
      toString in class acsse.csc2a.nova.models.CelestialBody
      Returns:
      a TAB-separated string representation of the Moon

    • getMetal
